ygData.subject: More black helicopters (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Wonder if what Kitasi mentioned below is coming true:-) ... From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@den.invesco.com] Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 10:45 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Wonder if what Kitasi mentioned below is coming true:-)

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 10:45 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: A Warning...


Will be interesting indeed though perhaps painful as well. It is just
incidents such as this which have in the past touched off hacker attacks on
various other internet sites. Anyone remember the attacks that shut down
Amazon for a couple of days after they removed a controversial book from
their sales?

And now on the EQVault main page:

Packet Loss issues Thu Oct 5 14:19:00 PDT 2000

Some players may be experiencing packet loss or disconnections from some
servers at this time. We are looking into the issue currently and hope to
have it resolved shortly.

- The EverQuest Team

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
